attributes.action: ban transit vans from using the fast lane on a motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the use of the fast lane should only be allowed for cars and thats it. no little vans, box vans, transit vans, motor homes, coaches,  or anything else that isnt a car! It is simply dangerous to have vehicles in the fast lane that do not allow a good degree of vision through the vehicle for motorists behind it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
